name: Little Leprechaun's - Greedy Gráinne
description:
If the unity player doesn't load you can download the full version below.

Our Project is Called "Greedy Gráinne", but we hope to expand on it in the future with extra chapters, new characters and let it become a serious of stories about Little Leprechauns, in game form.

It's a 3D Puzzle Platformer, for children between 5 and 13

Gráinne McAries is a Little Leprechaun, imprisoned by her Father for 33 years, that loves gold and Magic Marshmallows.Grumpy Fador McAries is ashamed of her and won't let her see or touch any of his gold and he always calls her Greedy. So a disgruntled Gráinne escapes and embarks on a journey in Leprechaun Land to prove him wrong.

The characters are Grainne, The All Knowing Frsh Cod and her "Evil" Father.
